name: COVID-19 Dataset
data_intro: The main goal of this project is to build a machine learning model that, given a Covid-19 patient's current symptom, status, and medical history, will predict whether the patient is in high risk or not.

num_feature_intro.SEX: -	sex:  1 for female and 2 for male.
num_feature_intro.INTUBED: -	intubed: whether the patient was connected to the ventilator.
num_feature_intro.PNEUMONIA: -	pneumonia: whether the patient already have air sacs inflammation or not.
num_feature_intro.PREGNANT: -	pregnancy: whether the patient is pregnant or not.
num_feature_intro.DIABETES: -	diabetes: whether the patient has diabetes or not.
num_feature_intro.COPD: -	copd: Indicates whether the patient has Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease or not.
num_feature_intro.ASTHMA: -	asthma: whether the patient has asthma or not.
num_feature_intro.INMSUPR: -	inmsupr: whether the patient is immunosuppressed or not.
num_feature_intro.CARDIOVASCULAR: -	cardiovascular: whether the patient has heart or blood vessels related disease.
num_feature_intro.OBESITY: -	obesity: whether the patient is obese or not.
num_feature_intro.TOBACCO: -	tobacco: whether the patient is a tobacco user.
num_feature_intro.ICU: -	icu: Indicates whether the patient had been admitted to an Intensive Care Unit.
